Evaluation_Questions: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of <u>intellectual challenge</u> of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the <u>workload</u> of this course was:
Comments_Questions: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
Comments_List: I learned to analyze texts at a much deeper level and developed the ability to put several texts and ideas in dialogue.
Improved close reading skills and learned about interesting life theories.
Interpretations of life under the lens of literature, film, politics and science.
I learned how to write better.

Strengths= workload isn't overbearing but course material is extremely interesting. Class revolves around discussions which keeps student's engaged
Weaknesses= class focused more on discussion than improving student writing; could be improved by performing professor-led in class workshops on how to construct a good essay

The course was very engaging and I often looked forward to class discussions. The readings were sometimes difficult to interpret but were often well explained in class by the professor. The  professor made his class a welcoming environment and a class that we all seemed to enjoy.
A very comprehensive and all-rounded development of ideas. However, readings can be abstract and lengthy in times.
I enjoyed this course. I think a weakness was a lack of connection between the different works we read but they were all interesting so I didnt mind.
I would definitely recommend to any student looking to improve on their writing and analysis skills.
I would definitely recommend this course to another student. This class totally changed the way I think about life and has allowed me to gain perspective on many aspects of my life.
I would highly recommend this course to another student. It is definitely one of the most interesting English 114 courses offered with one of the more engaging and helpful professors.
Yes, it is a course that will change your views on life. But to be honest I didnt learn too much about writing. Nonetheless its a nice course.
Yes. I enjoyed this course very much.
